name: insignificantly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is small or not noticeable, and therefore not considered important: Health officials dismiss the problem as insignificantly small.not insignificantly I am being punished, and not insignificantly. See
insignificant
More examplesFewer examplesDo you want curtains that are a focal feature of your room or ones that blend insignificantly into the background?The turning, rather insignificantly signposted, is after about 1km on the left.The divers look insignificantly tiny amid the vast expanse of ocean.
